action--b41214d2-5610-4c92-b469-54158c39.description: Terminate any processes that are executing the malicious PowerShell script.

parallel--e1dff22c-c43f-43b2-aa5f-0da60a.description: Monitor external communications and perform antivirus scan on compromised hosts.

action--c587d304-1bad-4937-86c8-4d50d110.description: Monitor network traffic for any data exfiltration attempts to external IP addresses.
